msbt.message: Well, hello! I'm new here, and you must be one of the fabulous residents of . The name's ! Enchanté, I'm sure.Wait, you're new here too? Well, if this isn't destiny, I don't know what is.
Hey, you must be this that I keep hearing about, right? Well, by now I assume you've heard of me, as well I'm ! If you need any tips about what's cool on , I'm your .

Hey, you're new here, aren't you? You must be !My name is and I'm sort of an unofficial ambassador for . I'll do anything in my unofficial capacity to help welcome you to the island, so don't hesitate to ask.
Bonjour! The name's .You're new to , right?<10_4 /> Well, let me be the first to say "" to you! May your life here be the freshest, most on-trend experience you've ever, uhexperienced

Hey, I don't believe we've met! I'm ! And you must be . So, did it hurt? When you fuh—fell down fruh—from h-hea—<10_10 />HEEEA-CHOO!<10_9 />UghI guess I'm not quite at 100 percent today.Come see me again sometime and I'll try not to sneeze on you.

Hey, are you from around here? Are you the I keep hearing about? Well, I'm ! I'm new here, but I'm hoping to make a big splash. My business cards are still in one of these boxes around here so I can't give you one right now But if you want a preview, they just read, "Meet : Professional Dancer and Legend"!

Hello, are you one of the residents of this fine island?<10_4 /> Alright!Nice to meet you! My name's . And you are?<10_4 /> , is it? Well, I'm brand-new here, and I'm all ears. We're in this together now, so let's get famous!
Hey, I don't think we've met, have we? The name's !Yep, I'm the you've been hearing about. And you are?<10_4 /> , right? Well, let's make our time on really count, shall we, ?
Yo! The name's , and I JUST realized why I moved here to It was to start band with you, !We'll call ourselvesBurnt ! Should I go ahead and order the T-shirts?
Ciao, uh Wait, who are you again?<10_4 /> Oh! We haven't met yet! Well, I'm ! And you're , is that right? Well, I'm glad we finally connected. Hope to see you around more often!

Who are you?!Sorry, I'm not feeling my best. I just moved to and I guess all the stress is getting to me. Oh, but once I get settled? You and me are gon—gonna—gonnahhh<10_10 />AAAAHCHOO!<10_9 />Whew. Again, sorry. Not myself. Let's talk later, .

Hey, you're from around here, right? , is it?Well, I'm ! I guess I'm a rookie around here, but I've got high hopes. Do you know ? We met on and that's who invited me here. I'm gonna be unpacking the full wardrobe today, but I'll catch up with you later!

Hey, you live here, right? And your name is ? Well, good to meet you! I actually met over on and they invited me to move here. I've been kinda busy with all the moving stuff, but now I'm ready to announce my presence. I'm !
Hey, good to meet you! The name's . I'm new to . Yeah, finally recruited me to come here. I'm what they callan influencer. I hope to be influencing your tastes in food and fashion soon! Ha HA!
Hello, I don't think we've met! And I thought I'd seen everyone here already The name's ! Do you know ? That's who recruited me here. I was kind of a big "get" for , to be honest.

Yo! I don't think we've met. The name's !I'm all about and cooking the world's best and And—ahhh—ahh <10_10 />AAAH-CHOO!<10_9 />Oof. Sorry about that. Couldn't get through the full résumé without horking. Let's meet up later when my sinuses aren't misbehaving.

Oh, hey there! Are you from here? Me too! Sort of. It's all a bit confusing right now See, I was minding my business, living on , when someone invited me to move here. I thought, why not? And here I am! But then the person who invited me just kind ofdisappeared. Anyway, I'm , and I'm here to make a weird and wonderful place.

Heya, pal! What's your name?<10_4 /> , is it? Cool! Good to meet you. I'm , formerly of !Someone invited me to move here and then immediately ghosted me. I can't say I haven't done the same. Anyway, let's make the most of it, !

Have we met? We haven't, right? I never forget a face.So, I'm ! No, you're not dreaming—I look this good in real life. Anyway, I just moved here to to—tahhh—tuhh <10_10 />HAAAA...CHOO!<10_9 /> Oh man. Can you come back when I'm not sick? I hate for folks to see this off-brand .

Ahh, are you from this fine island? , is it? Well, good to meet you! I'm! <10_4 />Sorry, I dabble in acting and I'm working on dramatic introductions. Believe it or not, I used to live here, but I moved to for a while. And now I'm back! Anyway, see you around!

Heya! You're from around here, right? Funny thing—I used to live here too. And, wellnow I live here again, actually. Ha HA! I go where I'm needed. Anyway, sorry it's taken so long for us to meet up. The name's —let's hang out!

Hmmnope. I don't know you. Do you know me? I'm ! Some folks consider me one of the first real locals, while others sa—sahhh—<10_7 arg="30" /> <10_10 />SAAH-CHOO!<10_9 />Others sayahh, forget it. Sorry, I can't put on the whole and pony show right now. Come see me when this cold blows over and we'll do it right!

We haven't met before, have we? I never forget an outfit. My name's ! And you are? , eh? Cool! I used to live on , but now I'm here, . Glad we finally met. Better late than never, eh? See you around!

Heya, what's your name?<10_4 /> , is that how you pronounce it? Cool name! So, ever heard of a little place called ? That's where I'm from originally. They call me Sir Von , but you can just call me . Yeah, is definitely better now that I live here on

Hey, good to meet you! Can I ask your nom de plume? That's French for "your name"! Oh, , is it? Very, very cool. Personally, my name's . I'm kinda new here—just in from .Anyway, I'm feeling pretty psyched about now that I've met you, !

Am I seeing things or have we just not met yet?I'm a little sick, so you'll have to forgive me for not doing the whole " thing." You know, where I introduce myself grandly, maybe do a little soft-shoe, and then promote my lip gloss brand. Another time, yeah?

Hey, it's . Right? I'm sure you remember me⁠. I mean, you went to all that trouble at the campsite to convince me to move here. Well, here I am. I moved in today! It's OK. You probably need a minute to soak in all the excitement.

Hey there, the name's —maybe you've heard of me. I was at the campsite here when started talking to me about life on this And before I knew it, my bags were packed, my social-media accounts were updated, and I was moving. Now I'm an official resident of ! And I can't wait to make my mark, .

Wait Are you from this ? You must be ! They call me . What am I doing here? It's kind of a funny story actuallyI was doing a bit of traveling and stopped at the campsite here for a little R & R. There, I ran into , who said this place needed someone to kick-start the social scene. And, being the altruistic type, I moved here before anyone else could steal my thunder. Hilarious, right?

We haven't met before, have we?<10_4 /> That's what I thought. I'm . Last time I was on this , I met at the campsite.They implied moving here might be great for my career as a lovable personality, ! Let's hope they were right! Glad to have met you, .

Wait! Don't tell me It's , right?<10_4 /> You looked like a . You can call me . I met when I was here visiting the campsite. They mentioned this island could use a with style, wit, and precise business acumen. I'm pretty sure I'm the only one of tho— Thohhh— Thahh—<10_10 />THAAA...CHOO!<10_9 />As you may have noticed, I've inhaled some kind of super-bug determined to bring me down. Come look me up once said super-bug has met its doom

Hello, hello, hello! Nice to meet you. I'm and you're! A name-dropper of my caliber makes it his business to know people's names. Someone at your campsite asked me to move here. Thought I was material. So starting today, I'm calling this little slice of paradise "home"!

Yo! The name's . I'm what you might call an island- hopping . But I was at the campsite the other day when someone said, "You should move here, ." And I was, like, "I should." So I guess my wandering days are overfor now, .

So you're the famous , eh?I'mahhh— Ahhh— Uhh— <10_10 />HAAA...CHOO!<10_9 />Uh, that was .I was checking out the campsite a while back and a talent scout of some sort tapped me for this island. I'm the type of you want around—you know, when I'm not riddled with a respiratory infection. Let's hang out when I'm back at full strength.
